title: Gravelocity 2018
subtitle: From Gravel Dr. to the top of the Blue Ridge Parkway.
author: cole
description: Who wants to do a gravel ride? Okay how about a 54 mile one? Okay how about 20 degrees? Perfect. Let's ride. Once again Gravelocity had a great turnout with people coming from Fredricksburg, Virginia Beach, and even Cincinnati!
keywords: gravel, ride, bike, road, blue ridge parkway, blue ridge, parkway, winter, group ride, gravelocity, beer, cross, cyclocross, adventure bike, cx, trail
